mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rowNum, Board.* FROM Board, (SELECT @rownum:=0)r;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(title, content, deadline, partner_limit, contact, reg_date, uid) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{deadline}, #{partner_limit}, #{contact}, #{reg_date}, #{uid})
mapper.select: SELECT bid FROM Board where reg_date=#{reg_date}
